Description:
Debug birt report will throw IOException

Steps to reproduce:
1. Debug birt report using attached report and java class.

Result:
Preview was correct but got exception in console.
Picked up _JAVA_OPTIONS: -Dawt.toolkit=mercury.awt.awtSW -Xrunmicsupp -Xbootclasspath/a:C:\PROGRA~1\COMMON~1\MERCUR~1\SHARED~1\JAVAAD~1\classes;C:\PROGRA~1\COMMON~1\MERCUR~1\SHARED~1\JAVAAD~1\classes\mic.jar
java.io.IOException: Couldn't get lock for C:\Documents and Settings\qauser1\Desktop\blank Eclipse 3.2RC1\plugins\org.eclipse.birt.report.viewer_2.1.0.N20060415-1243\birt\logs\ReportEngine_2006_04_21_15_18_08.log

Java
VIEWER should call mkdir to create the loging folder before set it to engine.
The log folder set to engine is pre-created and locate in "birt/logs". This errors seems to be the writting contention of locked file. How does this happen?
